section.append: acpi=on selinux=0 apm=off resume=/dev/disk/by-id/ata-QEMU_HARDDISK_QM00001-part1 splash=silent quiet showopts
section.name: Desktop -- openSUSE 11.2 - 2.6.31.5-0.1

section.append: showopts apm=off noresume edd=off powersaved=off nohz=off highres=off processor.max_cstate=1 x11failsafe
section.name: Failsafe -- openSUSE 11.2 - 2.6.31.5-0.1

alias.comment: Basic system aliases that MUST be present.
General redirections for pseudo accounts in /etc/passwd.
"abuse" is often used to fight against spam email
